snippet: Former classmates and acquaintances of Adam Lanza described him as an awkward loner who was deeply uncomfortable in social situations.
abstract: Adam Lanza, gunman who carried out one of the deadliest school shootings in the nation’s history, killing 20 children and six adults at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Conn, is described by former classmates and acquaintances of as an awkward loner who was deeply uncomfortable in social situations; history of mass shootings in US charted.
lead_paragraph: Former classmates and acquaintances of Adam Lanza described him as an awkward loner who was deeply uncomfortable in social situations.

headline.seo: Adam Lanza, an Enigma Who Is Now Identified as a Mass Killer
headline.main: A Gunman, Recalled as Intelligent and Shy, Who Left Few Footprints in Life
headline.print_headline: A Gunman, Recalled as Intelligent and Shy, Who Left Few Footprints in Life
